data.title: Best Movies Like Inception
data.meta_description: Movies Similar to Inception: Tenet (2020), Source Code (2011), Shutter Island (2010), The Prestige (2006), Minority Report (2002), The Matrix (1999), Looper (2012), The Thirteenth Floor (1999), Interstellar (2014), Transcendence (2014)
